messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: [Rr]oom [0-9]+'

Imagine a world with twelve rooms. From the lobby you have two choices, room 1 and room 2. You enter room 1, at the end thereâ€™s a door that leads to room 3, and room 3 leads to room 5. There is a door in room 5 that leads to room 7 and room 7 leads to room 9. From room 9 you can enter room 11. Thereâ€™s a chest in room 11. You open it and there is 10 dollars, but you do not take any money, youâ€™re just learning about the environment. Then you exit and start over. This time in the lobby you choose room 2, then enter room 4, which leads to room 6. There is a door in room 6 that leads to room 8 and room 8 leads to room 10. At the end there is a door that leads to room 12. Thereâ€™s a chest with 50 dollars in room 12, but you do not take any money, youâ€™re just learning about the environment. You return to the lobby. You will only be able to choose one path that leads to the most money. Which room from the lobby will lead to the path where one can make the most money?

A shell interpreter is a subset of a programming language interpreter, which interprets commands to a shell , through which the user can cause the computer to execute his requests. The specific set of commands itinterprets is shell language , and the user interface is often Command-line interface .
Each shell interpreter is associated with one specific shell language, which can depend on the operating system you're using with that very same shell interpreter. Most shell interpreters will have the same or very similar functionality on different systems, but the shell languages will be different between operating systems.
A shell interpreter may also be referred to as a shell. Shells can allow the same command to be performed in different ways. Two main classes of shells are the bash shell and csh (c
